author: andschwa
body: Resolves #972. @paulcallen You will want to test that this doesn't break PSRP, and submit a PR with any necessary changes to fix it. @vors Please review and sign-off when done. There was an unusually sad amount of code duplication in this last round. Note that I'm not compiling `GetComputerInfoCommand.cs`. If you can get that to work, just add to this branch. I will tag once this is done (so we can rebase if need be). I will also make a branch that we reset to the latest original copy of code, so we can diff easily. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1001)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: LGTM. Let's leave GetComputerInfoCommand.cs as is for now

title: Merge Source Depot changes
